vlive.korean: 승산이 있는 거. The ones that I have a chance of winning. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [몬채널][B] EP.105 '몬스타엑스레이3' 4화
vlive.english: The ones that I have a chance of winning.

vlive.korean: 막내인 저랑 하면 승산있어요. You'll win if you team up wit me since I'm the youngest. 듣기 View video NCT : [NCT LIVE] DREAM 호버보드 미니 올림픽
vlive.english: You'll win if you team up wit me since I'm the youngest.

vlive.korean: [어차피 땅의 개수로 우승팀이 결정되는 상황 땅을 뺏으면 승산이 있다!] 뺏으면 돼. [Whoever has the most spaces wins] We can just steal. 듣기 View video Amigo TV : 본격 아이돌 혜자방송 <아이돌에 미치고, 아미고TV> 빅스편 (5/7)
vlive.english: [Whoever has the most spaces wins] We can just steal.

vlive.korean: 이대로는 내가 볼때 미션 성공 못해. - 맞아, 승산이 없어. At this rate, we can't complete the mission. - Right. There'll be no chance. 듣기 View video STARSHIP : 우주소녀 이미지 증발 버라이어티 <우소보쇼>
vlive.english: At this rate, we can't complete the mission. - Right. There'll be no chance.

vlive.korean: 이거 재밌다. - 승산이 있어요. 지금부터 다 이기시면 됩니다. This is fun. - You have a chance at winning. If you win everything else starting from now on. 듣기 View video BTS : [FULL]방탄늬우스 COMEBACK SPECIAL ('BTS NEWS' COMEBACK SPECIAL)
vlive.english: This is fun. - You have a chance at winning. If you win everything else starting from now on.

examples.korean: I’m in a no-win situation. 발음듣기 난 어떻게 해도 승산이 없는 처지에 처해 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’m in a no-win situation. 발음

examples.korean: I’d assess your chances as low. 발음듣기 난 당신의 승산이 낮다고 봐요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’d assess your chances as low. 발음

examples.korean: The race was won by a 20–1 outsider. 발음듣기 그 경주에서는 20 대 1로 승산이 없던 선수가 우승했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The race was won by a 20–1 outsider. 발음

examples.korean: She always wagered on an outsider. 발음듣기 그녀는 항상 승산이 없는[우승 가능성이 낮은] 말에 돈을 걸었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She always wagered on an outsider. 발음

examples.korean: The winning horse was a rank outsider. 발음듣기 우승한 말은 전혀 승산이 없던 말이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The winning horse was a rank outsider. 발음
